name: Pack It
description:
• Developed Special For Quarantine Jam!!! 
  • 300+ Items
  • 3 Item category
  • Great sounds
  • Wonderful Music
  • Try to pack it !!!

How To Play

  • Click on the items of the selected category. ()
  • Pack Items to boxes     
  • Do not Drop items outside the box 
  • Buy help for packs        
  • Have Fun  

Credit

  • Sound's from https://freesound.org/ 
  • Music from https://www.bensound.com/ 
  • Icon pack by REXARD 

Developer: ForFarm_Gamedev
